code: import{useContext}from'react';import AuthContext from'../../context/AuthContext';import useForm from'../../hooks/useForm';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var initialUser={username:'',email:'',password:''};var Register=function Register(){var _useForm=useForm(initialUser),form=_useForm.form,handleInputChange=_useForm.handleInputChange;var username=form.username,email=form.email,password=form.password;var _useContext=useContext(AuthContext),register=_useContext.register;var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(evt){evt.preventDefault();if(!username||!email||!password){console.log('Debe ingresar el nombre de usuario o contraseña.');return;}register({username:username,email:email,password:password});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"register__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Registro de cuenta"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"register__container-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"username",type:"text",placeholder:"Nombre de usuario",value:username,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",type:"text",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"password",type:"password",placeholder:"Contrase\xF1a",value:password,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Registrar"})]})]})});};export default Register;
